name: Baklava
description: A sweet dessert pastry made of layers of filo filled with chopped nuts, sweetened with syrup or honey.
steps: Preheat oven and grease the baking dish.
Layer the filo dough with melted butter and chopped nuts.
Cut into diamond shapes before baking.
Pour cooled syrup over the hot baklava immediately after baking.
ingredients: 300 grams mixed nuts (walnuts, pistachios, almonds), chopped
tips: Keep the filo dough covered with a damp cloth to prevent drying out.
Cut the baklava before baking to make serving easier.
Allow the baklava to cool completely to absorb the syrup properly.
